name: Defend Your Teeth! (Bento Putra Hermanto)
description: Defend Your Teeth! is a tower defense game, like tower defense game our job here is defend our castle or our base. But this game not just tower defense mostly but in this game we want to show some education. How we give some education in this game? with our castle as Tooth and our tower as Toothpaste, Toothbrush and etc. And our enemies as Candy, Cake, and Chocolate, and for defend our tooth (castle) we must use toothpaste, toothbrush for defend our tooth for prevent enemies damage our teeth. This game want to tell you about if we don't defend our tooth candy, chocolate can damage our teeth and make our teeth hollow
